body:
Declare @Aranacak Varchar(100) = '$CURSOR$'

Select      O.name, O.type_desc, ASM.definition, 
			SUBSTRING(ASM.definition, IIF(H.Found > 50, H.Found - 50, 0), 100) GectigiYer,
			((LEN(ASM.definition)-LEN(REPLACE(ASM.definition, @Aranacak, ''))) / len(@Aranacak)) As [Kac Kez Geciyor]
From        sys.all_sql_modules ASM
            Inner Join sys.objects O On O.object_id = ASM.object_id
            Cross Apply( Select CHARINDEX(@Aranacak, ASM.definition) Found ) H
Where       H.Found > 0
Order By    O.type_desc, [Kac Kez Geciyor] ASC
